website_summaries.verdict: Alvin and the Chipmunks are especially known for their beloved Christmas special and songs, and this festive singing doll is the perfect gift for Alvin’s biggest fans.
pros: Sings “Christmas Don’t Be Late” and says several phrases when his tummy is pressed
cons: Hard plastic head and Santa hat isn’t cuddly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like Alvin
customer_reviews.text: I am an extreme Alvin fan and my singing Alvin broke so I have searched for a replacement. Bought this as I was really missing the Holidays without Alvin. I am disappointed. Doesn't really look like Alvin. More like a boy doll with a brown line on his nose. Sound is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, but it does not play the Christmas Song in its entirety. Also, the song starts to play in the middle of the phrases he says. My kids will like it but they will outgrow it very fast.
customer_reviews.author: LLC

customer_reviews.title: Large Impressive Doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll was larger than I expected, so I was pleasantly surprised. Sound of the recorded song clips is clear and great quality. My niece loved him!
customer_reviews.author: LEHGHK

customer_reviews.title: So cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift I love 💕 the way that it is easy to use. To activate the sound you need a little push on the belly and it works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Jo.DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect doll for the price. Really great deal & lots of fun sayings & songs. I will put it out for my son every Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Heather Russell

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves getting these for Christmas. This one was the best yet. So cute to watch and listen
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I just don't see a place to open to change ...
customer_reviews.text: I just don't see a place to open to change the battery. I may have to open at seam and attach velcro. Did not have time to do it yet.
customer_reviews.author: cassandre young

customer_reviews.title: I love everything chipmunks
customer_reviews.text: I like everything chipmunks. Every year I get my daughter a chipmunk for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Sadona 57

customer_reviews.title: Great little alvin
customer_reviews.text: So much bigger than I expected and adorable and loveable
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for my chipmunk loving son.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Very cute toy, made well. Alvin has a stuffed body with a large plastic head and when you press on his belly he sings and talks. We love the ornament too, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. It is a great size and the singing and talking sounds just like Alvin and Dave.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: If you grew up in the fifties, this is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you grew up in the fifties, this is the Alvin you might remember. My grandchildren would not have recognized him from the current cartoon. I returned him.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Aaaallllllvvvvviiiiiiinn
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandma who loves singing Christmas toys. Overall pretty good, however the head is hard plastic and heavy making it hard to sit the toy up.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and packaged well. It does sing their version of the full song. Little too heavy since the heads plastic and the body is soft but it’s amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: annie harmon

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Chipmunk Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My little cousin absolutely loved it. I would be careful with kids that are a little more agressive because the head is not plush and can hurt if they accidentally hit someone with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gio Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this singing Alvin! Had to buy a second one because they didn't want to share! The we're adorable and soft for the little ones to hold and hug.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: He is so darn cute.
customer_reviews.text: He is so darn cute. And yhe chipmunks sing along I just wish I could have had the chipmunks also to buy or to come with him
customer_reviews.author: I  NEVER  get anything  to read unless  I  can hold it & turn the  page.  "STOP PUTTING  THEM OM ANY OF MY ACCOUNTs".  Give me my refund  veom NOW  ALL THE Wy back  to  4 years  ago!

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with Alvin and the chipmunks. I put Alvin hanging out of his stocking stuffer. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun chipmunk
customer_reviews.text: Cute talking Alvin! My son lives the cartoon and was thrilled with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: LSLew

customer_reviews.title: Loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My kids all love Alvin. My nephew wad dancing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute .. He came early wasn't supposed to be there til after Christmas but he come on Christmas eve. Speedy shipping. He is too heavy but he sings and looks cute
customer_reviews.author: sheila mandra

customer_reviews.title: Love the Chipmunks
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a baby and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Nombrano

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Voice box works perfectly. So happy with my purchase, and so is my son :)
customer_reviews.author: Gavin courtney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my nephew's new favorite toy. He carries it around everywhere he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alvin was a gift at Christmas for my 4 year old grandson. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic Alvin & the Chipmunks with Holiday Flair - Love this!
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is super cute! My kids love Alvin & the Chipmunks and this is so much more - fun holiday flair with the outfit, ornament and holiday song. Great price. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: since this looks like a small boy not a chipmunk
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit confused at first, since this looks like a small boy not a chipmunk. The face of it is hard plastic, I'd have preferred something a bit more cuddly. However, it's a big hit with my children (5 and 7) who can't get enough of Alvin & the Chipmunks, press the stomach and you get the fun songs and sayings, they can't get enough. The list price is about $20 which I think is way overpriced, $10 or less is the max I'd pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: sfdk

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Don't Be Late
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this Alvin talking and singing toy. He may not look exactly like the original Alvin chipmunk (he looks more like a small boy), but that is OK as the sounds are great. He is also quite nostalgiv for adults who grew up with the chipmunks at Christmas time. The best feature is that he sings the Chipmunks' holiday classic, "Christmas Don't Be Late" for about 20 seconds when you do a long press of his belly.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Thought

customer_reviews.title: So cute and batteries are included!
customer_reviews.text: This Alvin is just adorable. He is actually larger than I expected. He also comes with an ornament. He is a well made plushy toy with a soft body and plastic head that speaks and sings holiday-themed songs. Batteries are included. The batteries are lasting after multiple plays. You can’t adjust the volume but he’s not so loud as to be annoying. The younger kids just love him.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

customer_reviews.title: It sings!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Alvin doll that sings the Christmas song we all know... and probably don't love. Although over Christmas, I did have to pull this out often to drive my mother in law nuts (and she laughed every time). This doll has a plush body and plastic head. It seems pretty safe for smaller children and it sings.
customer_reviews.author: Sassbot

customer_reviews.title: It's a collectable
customer_reviews.text: This holiday plush doll is very cute, and as the picture shows, it does not look like Alvin the Chipmonk only sounds like him. The sound is good quality. An ornament is also enclosed. It's a collectible to add to your Christmas decorations.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This Alvin toy is awesome. The kids absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This Alvin toy is awesome. The kids absolutely love it. It sings Christmas tunes and sounds just like Alvin of the chipmunks. We love the ugly Christmas sweater and shoes. It is sturdy too, as the kids have really played with it a lot and it has withstood wonderfully. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but my daughter outgrew it. I lasted one winter though.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great Holiday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and my 5 year old is in love. Any kid that is into the Chipmunks will really really love this doll!
customer_reviews.author: C. A Scovel

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Alvin & The Chipmunks, Singing Holiday Alvin Plush
product_meta.description: What better way to celebrate the holidays than to hug and snuggle with your favorite Chipmunk pal, Alvin. Alvin is celebrating the holidays in style, wearing a Santa hat and the cutest ugly holiday sweater ever! Press Alvin's belly to hear him sing his holiday classic "Christmas Don't Be Late" as well as say fun holiday-themed phrases from his show, ALVINNN!!! AND THE CHIPMUNKS. You'll even hear an instrumental version of the song so you and your child can sing along.
feature_bullets: Talking Alvin & the Chipmunks premium plush doll
Press his belly for fun holiday phrases
Sings the Chipmunks' holiday classic, "Christmas Don't Be Late"
Alvin wears a Santa hat and an "ugly" holiday sweater
Also includes an exclusive ornament you can hang on your tree!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
